Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 20

Contact us:

Managers: Carl Bell and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
20A Nayland High Street P.O. 1000 – 1115
20B Smallbridge Flint Cottages 1130 – 1150
20C Bures Claypit Corner 1205 – 1235
20D Bures Church Square 1240 – 1310
20E Bures Normandie Way 1420 – 1450
20F Bures Paddocks 1455 – 1525
20G Little Cornard Workhouse Green 1540 – 1605
20H Assington Vickary Estate (junction) 1615 – 1635
20I Newton Green Church Road 1645 – 1700

Calling every 4 weeks on Saturdays:

2019: 5 January, 2 February, 2 March, 30 March, 27 April, 25 May, 22 June, 20 July, 17 August, 14 September, 12 October, 9 November, 7 December
